sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import CommonBanner from "../../common/banner/CommonBanner"; import Footer from "../../common/footer/Footer"; import Header from "../../common/header/Header"; import InfoSection from "../../common/infoSection/InfoSection"; class OnsiteOffshore extends React.Component { render() { return ( <>
Onsite Offshore Model

BrainHR IT Solutions offers an Onsite-Offshore model as a unique solution for IT projects that require staff augmentation. This model helps reduce financial expenditure by providing years of expertise in staff augmentation, thereby reducing the cost burden spent on recruiting and maintaining staff for permanent, temporary, or in-house positions. BrainHR IT Solutions uses in-built metrics developed through extensive data analytics, assisted by AI, to offer the best solutions for completing a given project well within the timeframe. This approach allows clients to focus on their core business while BrainHR IT Solutions handles the staffing and project management aspects of the IT project.

At BrainHR IT Solutions, we offer an unique solution Onsite-Offshore Model with years of expertise in staff Augmentation, to reduce your financial expenditure exponentially in an IT Project to Hire and maintain staff and reduce cost burden spent on Recruiting and Staff Augmentation for Permanent, Temporary client and In-house Positions. Using our in-built metrics we developed through extensive Data Analytics with assisted AI, we offer you best solutions to complete a given project well within time frame. This model allows our clients to work with us on a project from the comfort of their own location while we handle the development process from our offshore development center. This unique model enables us to provide our clients with cost-effective solutions without compromising on quality. Our team of experienced developers and project managers ensure that we deliver on-time, within budget, and meet our client's expectations.

Our model mainly addresses two problems. One of which is addressing the problem scenario where Client doesn’t have Company branches outside the country of its establishment, where many awesome Talented Individuals are there but need a Vendor Partner company established and registered there to carry out day-day Daily operations of their own staff working remotely or offshore and give them a fantastic office atmosphere as well as Running their Payroll, taking care of their taxes and serving them benefits and retaining the Talent for long periods of time for all the Future projects clients will need to expertise as such.{" "}

Our Offshore Team takes care of all the aspects of consultants hired for Onsite-Offshore Model, generating very high amounts of savings and profits while giving you the advantage of offering our solutions to enhance and augment the End Product of the said Project by giving in our own inputs if necessary to add extra features. We act as perfect Interface Bridge between the offshore consultants and onsite site for day-to-day coordination and execution of the project smoothly act and serve as your extended arm and execute your commands to the best End result.{" "}

BrainHR follows Agile Scrum and Waterfall methodologies to ensure efficient and effective project management. Agile Scrum and Waterfall are two of the most commonly used project management methodologies in the software development industry. At BrainHR, we have expertise in both methodologies and we use them based on the specific needs of the project.

Agile Scrum is an iterative and incremental approach to project management, where the project is divided into small, manageable chunks or sprints. Each sprint lasts for a fixed duration, typically 2-4 weeks, and at the end of each sprint, a working product increment is delivered. The Scrum framework consists of three roles: the Product Owner, the Scrum Master, and the Development Team. The team works collaboratively and communicates regularly to ensure that the project progresses smoothly and meets the customer's requirements.

Waterfall, on the other hand, is a more traditional approach to project management, where the project is divided into sequential phases, such as planning, design, implementation, testing, and maintenance. Each phase is completed before the next one begins, and the project progresses in a linear fashion. The Waterfall methodology is more suitable for projects with well-defined requirements and a fixed scope.

At BrainHR, we follow a flexible approach to project management and tailor our methodology to suit the specific requirements of each project. We use Agile Scrum for projects with a high degree of uncertainty and rapidly changing requirements, while Waterfall is used for projects with well-defined requirements and a fixed scope. Our team has extensive experience in using both methodologies, and we ensure that our project management practices are transparent, collaborative, and effective.

Contact us to learn more about our Onsite-offshore Model and we promise you, you will seriously consider our Model to execute all your current and future Projects. we have the expertise and experience to provide customized solutions that meet the unique needs of our clients. Our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction sets us apart from our competitors. With our help, businesses can stay ahead of the curve and achieve success in the ever-evolving digital landscape.

Another advantage of our onsite-offshore model is flexibility. Our clients can scale their IT teams up or down as needed, without having to worry about the time and expense of hiring and training new staff. We work closely with our clients to understand their needs and provide customized solutions that meet their specific requirements. In addition, our onsite-offshore model allows our clients to take advantage of 24/7 support. With our teams located in different time zones, we can provide around-the-clock support to ensure that our clients' IT systems are always up and running.

In addition to the advantages mentioned above, the onsite-offshore model also allows for increased flexibility in staffing. As project requirements change, it is easier to scale resources up or down as needed. This helps ensure that projects stay on schedule and within budget. Furthermore, our onsite-offshore model enables us to provide round-the-clock support for our clients. Our team members located offshore work in different time zones, so we can provide support outside of standard business hours.

Our onsite-offshore model is that it enables us to provide cost-effective solutions without compromising on quality. By leveraging the skills and expertise of our offshore team, we can deliver high-quality IT solutions at a lower cost. This is particularly beneficial for small and mid-sized businesses that may have limited resources but still require sophisticated IT services to remain competitive in their respective markets.

The onsite offshore model has become increasingly popular in recent years as it offers several benefits such as cost savings, access to a larger talent pool, and 24/7 development cycles. Companies that implement the onsite offshore model need to ensure that they have a strong management framework in place to ensure effective communication and collaboration between onsite and offshore teams. This is where BrainHR can help, as they have extensive experience in managing onsite offshore projects and ensuring seamless coordination between teams.

According to a survey by Deloitte, 59% of companies that use an offshore model for software development reported significant cost savings. A study by McKinsey & Company found that companies using an offshore model for IT services can achieve cost savings of 30-60%. The same McKinsey study also found that companies using an offshore model can see productivity gains of 20-30% due to the ability to leverage a global talent pool and work around the clock. The Global Delivery Locations Cost Comparison report by Everest Group showed that India, which is a popular offshore location, has a cost savings potential of 60-70% compared to onshore locations in the US or UK.

By leveraging our onsite/offshore model, companies can benefit from cost savings, increased productivity, and access to a larger pool of skilled resources. BrainHR, with its expertise in providing staffing and outsourcing services to clients worldwide, can help businesses achieve these benefits and optimize their operations.With our onsite-offshore model, we are able to deliver high-quality IT solutions while also providing cost savings to our clients. This statistic highlights the growing trend towards outsourcing and the need for reliable outsourcing partners like BrainHR IT Solutions.

); } } export default OnsiteOffshore;
